verses.content: Ahab chun Samaria chun nau- pasal sâwmsari a nei a. Chun, Jehu chun Samaria Jezreel khaw hotu, upahai kuoma le Ahab nauhai lo enkawl tleituhai kuoma chun lekha a thawn a.
“Hi lekha hi in hmu phingleh, in pu nauhai chu in kuoma um an na; tawlailîrhai, sakawrhai, kulpui nei khuohai dâm, râlthuomhai khawm in nei a na;
chuongchun, in pu nauhai laia a ṭha tak le a fel tak zawng suok unla, a pa lal ṭhungphaah inṭhungtir unla, in pu sûnghai do chu dopui ro,” tiin.
Nisienlakhawm, anni chun an ṭi ta êm êm el a, “Ngai ta u, lal pahni khawm khan an hne ta naw a na, einin iengtin am hne thei hlak ei ta?” an ta.

Chun, lal in sûnga hotu tak dâm, khawpui awptuhai dâm, upahai le naupanghai lo enkawltuhai chun Jehu kuoma chun, “I siehlawhai kan nih, thaw dinga i mi hril ang phawt chun thaw pei kan tih; tukhawm lalah siem naw ning ung ah, nangin ṭha i ti ang angin thaw el rawh,” tiin mi an tir a.

Chun, an kuomah, “Keia tienga ṭhang in na, ka thu in awi ding chun in pu naupasalhai lu hang la unla, zîngah hieng tik phât hin Jezreelah ka kuomah hung ro,” tiin lekha a thawn nâwk a. Lal naupasalhai chu sâwmsari an na, khawpui mi lienhai, anni enkawl tleituhai kuoma chun an um a.
Chun, lekha chu an hmu chun lal naupahai chu an man a, a sâwmsari chun an that a, an luhai chu bâwm- rângah an sieh a, Jezreel khuoah a kuomah an inphur tah a.
Chun, thangko a hung a, “Lal naupasalhai lu chu an hung lâk tah,” tiin a hril a. Chun, ama chu, “Kul lûtna kawtkhâr bulah hmun hniah intieng khâwm unla, zinga chen um raw se,” a ta.
Chun, a zînga chun a va suok a, a ngîr a, mi po po kuoma chun, “Mi fel in nih; ngai ta u, ka pu chu ka phier rûk a, ka lo sukhlum ta luoh a; anleh, hienghai po po hi tu that am an nih a?
LALPA chun Ahab sûnghai chungchâng thu a hril a, LALPA thu chu hnuoi chunga hin luong hmang el naw ni ti hre ro; LALPAIN a siehlaw Elija hmanga a hril kha a hung suktlung a ni ta hi,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Jehu chu Jezreel khuoa Ahab sûnghai la um po po le, a mi lienhai po po le, a ruolhai po po le, a thiempuhai chu pakhat khawm hlapêk hlek loin a that fai vawng a.
Chun, a tho a, a suok a, Sama- riah a fe tah a. Chun, lampuia berâm- puhai berâm hmul vâwna hmun a va tlung chun,
Jehu chun Juda lal Ahazia unauhairawi a hmuh a, “Tuhai am in nih a?” a ta. Anni chun, “Ahazia unauhai kan na, lal nauhai le; lalnu nauhai chibai kan zu bûk ding a nih,” tiin an dawn a.
Chun, ama chun, “A hringin man tâwl ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, a hringin an man tâwl a, berâm hmul vâwna in khur bula chun an that a, mi sâwmli le pahni zet an nih, pakhat khawm an hla nawh.

Chun, chutaka inthawka a suok hnung chun Rekab naupa Jehonadab, ama tuok dinga hung a va hmuh a; chuongchun, chibai a bûk a, a kuom- ah, “I chunga lungril indik ka put ang hin lungril indik i put ve am chu?” a ta. Jehonadab chun, “Put e,” tiin a dawn a. “Anleh i kut mi hang pe ta,” a ta. Chuongchun, a kut chu a hang pêk a; chun, ama chun a kuomah a tawlailîr sûngah a kei lût tah a.
Chun, ama chun, “Ka kuomah hung ve la, LALPA ta dinga ṭhahnem ka ngaizie hi hang hmu ve hrim ta khai,” a ta. Chuongchun, a tawlailîra chun ân chuongtir ve tah a.
Chun, Samari a va tlung chun Ahab sûnghai Samaria la um sunhai chu a sukbohmang vawng hmakhat chun a that pei a, Elija kuoma a hril, LALPA thu ang ngei khan.
Chun, Jehu chun mipuihai po po chu a ko khâwm a, an kuoma chun, “Ahab khan Baal rawng hi a bâwl met chau a na, Jehu ruok hin chu nasa- takin a nih a bâwl ding chu.

Chuongchun, Baal zâwlneihai po po le a betuhai po po le a thiem- puhai po po ka kuoma hin hung ko khâwm ta u; tukhawm a kim naw um naw raw se, Baal kuoma hin in- thâwina ropuitak inhlân ding ka nei a, tukhawm a kim naw taphawt chu hring dêr naw nih,” a ta. Nisien- lakhawm, Jehu chun Baal betuhai chu sukhlum tumin, var vervêkin a thaw a nih.
Chun, Jehu chun, “Baal hming- in ruoiṭhena ropui siem ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, chu chu an inthawn vêl tah a.

Chun, Jehu chun Israel ram po poah a thawn vêl a; chuongchun, Baal betuhai po po chu an hung a, ṭhang naw hrim hrim an um nawh. Chun, Baal ina chun an lût a; chun, Baal in chu kawtkhâra inthawka châwrtieng chenin an sip mup el a.
Chun, inthuomna puon enkawl- tu kuomah, “Baal betuhai po po hi inthuomna puon hung lapêk ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, inthuomna puonhai chu a hung lâkpêk a.
Chun, Jehu chu Rekab naupa Jehonadab le chun Baal inah an lût a, Baal betuhai kuoma chu, “Hitaka hin Baal betuhai ti lo, LALPA mihai lo um ve rawi an tih, zawng unla, en vêl ta u,” a ta.

Chun, inthâwinahai le pumraw- hmang thilinhlân inhlân dingin an lût a. Jehu chun tuola chun mi sâwm- riet a lo inngîr ta hrim a, “Hieng in kuta ka pêk ta cheu hi tukhawm an suok vai chun, ân suotu chun, a hringna aia chun ama hringna chu chân a tih,” a ta.

Chun, pumrawhmang thilin- hlân chu ân hlân zo chun Jehu chun vêngtu sipai le an hotu kuoma chun, “Va lût unla, va that ro, tukhawm insuoktir naw ro,” a ta. Chun, kâwl- hnâmin an sât rak el a; chun, vêngtu sipai le an hotuhai chun an pei suok a; chun, Baal in umna khuoa chun an feh a.
Chun, Baal ina milimhai chu an lâksuok a, an rawh a.
Chun, Baal lungphun chu an sukchim a, Baal in chu an suksiet a, inhnâwmna inah an hmang tah a; tu chen hin an la hmang zing a nih.
Chuong ang chun Jehu chun Baal chu Israel rama chun a suk- bohmang a nih.
Nisienlakhawm, Nebat naupa Jeroboam suolna-Israelhai thil in- suksuoltira a thawhai chu Jehu chun a bân chuong nawh a; chu chu Bethel khuo le Dan khuoa rângkachak bâwngte lim biek a nih.

Chun, LALPAIN Jehu kuomah, “Ka mittlungtaka thil i thaw lei le, ka lungril duthusâm angtaka Ahab sûnghai chunga i thaw leiin, i naupa- salhai chu suon li chenin Israel lalṭhungphaah ṭhung an tih,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Jehu chun LALPA, Israelhai Pathien dân chu a lungril po poin a pawm nawh a; Jero- boamin Israelhai thil insuksuoltira a suksuol kha a bân chuong nawh a.
Chuong lai chun LALPA chun Israelhai chu a thlauthlâk ṭan tah a; chuongchun, Hazael chun Israel ram po poa chun a hne pei a;
Jordana inthawka khawsak tieng, Gilead ram po po, Gadhai le, Reubenhai le, Manassehai dâm, Arnon ruoma Aroera inthawka Gilead le Basan ram tlung rakin.
Jehu chanchin danghai, a thil- thaw po pohai, a thilthawtheizie po pohai chu Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chuongchun, Jehu chu a pi le puhai kuoma chun a in tah a, Samari khuoah an phûm tah a. Chun, a naupa Jehoahaz chu ama aiawin ân lal tah a.
Samari rama Israelhai chunga Jehu rorêl sûng chu kum sâwmhni le kum riet a nih.
